originalText.text: DO NOT BUY FROM THEM!!!! They sent defective item and refused to give full refund!! Doubt if it's even authentic, given the terrible quality. Their so-called vendor partner is an irresponsible eBay seller!! Their products are literally being sold on eBay at a much lower price!! A total rip-off!! Will report this to FTC.

text.text: DO NOT BUY FROM THEM!!!! They sent defective item and refused to give full refund!! Doubt if it's even authentic, given the terrible quality. Their so-called vendor partner is an irresponsible eBay seller!! Their products are literally being sold on eBay at a much lower price!! A total rip-off!! Will report this to FTC.

originalText.text: I ordered two pairs of pajamas for my daughter in size 2T and they sent me 12-18mo by accident. I didn’t notice until after I threw out the packaging and now they’re not letting me return, exchange, or anything. On top of it, they’re being incredibly rude and blaming ME for THEIR mistake. Saying it’s my fault for not realizing the error. NEVER purchase from here. Amazon would send you new pairs without even sending the wrong ones back. STAY AWAY.

originalText.text: Horrible customer service, order item with the wrong size and unable to get it return and get refund and I think they did that on purpose to trick customers.

originalText.text: Worst place ever!! Horrible costumer service and very disrespectful people.  Wont shop here anymore and I hope you guys don't either!! Stay away and save your money for a better place.

originalText.text: These people Sell counterfeit bags do not buy from them. These people should be out of business, they don’t let you return and say it’s final sale knowing they sell counterfeit.
